H0.text: what is the name of india pakistan border. Radcliffe Line

H1.text: what is the name of india pakistan border. Indo-Pak Frontier

H2.text: what is the name of india pakistan border. Kashmir Border

H3.text: what is the name of india pakistan border. IB

A4.text: The Radcliffe Line was the boundary demarcated by the two boundary commissions for the provinces of Punjab and Bengal during the Partition of India.

A5.text: However, outside of Punjab and Bengal, the boundary is made of pre-existing provincial boundaries and had nothing to do with the Radcliffe commissions.

A6.text: Decision and award of the Bengal Boundary Commission, 12 August 1947

A7.text: Boundary disputes between India and Pakistan relating to the interpretation of the report of the Bengal Boundary Commission, Reports of International Arbitral Awards, United Nations, 26 January 1950

A8.text: The International Boundary (IB) or Radcliffe Line - runs from Punjab to Gujarat and Sindh: The demarcated line between the India and Pakistan is recognized by both nations.
